title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 3597/93 of 21 December 1993 fixing the amount of the carry-over aid for certain fishery products for the 1994 fishing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 3597/93 of 21 December 1993 fixing the amount of the carry-over aid for certain fishery products for the 1994 fishing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1994 fishing year, the carry-over aid for the products listed in Annex I A, D and E to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92 (3) shall be as indicated in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1993.
For the Commission
Yannis PALEOKRASSAS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 392, 31. 12. 1992, p. 29.
(2) OJ No L 191, 31. 7. 1993, p. 86.
(3) OJ No L 388, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
ANNEX
1. Amount of the carry-over aid for products listed in Annex and for sole Solea spp. listed in Annex I, E to Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92
